title: Drawing, "God the Father and Angels", ca. 1750–1800
medium: Black and red chalk on thick cream paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: God the Father is flying, arms outstretched. An angel is kneeling immediately beneath him upon a cloud, upon which four other angles are also kneeling and sitting further down. A small angel holds a palm branch.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "God the Father and Angels", ca. 1750–1800.
ca. 1750–1800. Black and red chalk on thick cream paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-6786.
